channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DOJ says it will finish review of Epstein files 'in the near term'

item.title: On Immigration, Let’s Just Follow the Constitution
item.description: Both sides’ tactics and threats on immigration are hurting America’s constitutional balance.

item.title: Crying Jimmy Kimmel’s Eyes Are Dry For Victims Of Violent Illegal Aliens
item.description: The clown crier has shed a lot of tears for radical activists fighting against federal law enforcement in peddling the left's narrative.

item.title: How the U.S. Navy Can Right the Ship
item.description: The Navy is losing a war of attrition — against its own bureaucracy.

item.title: Sorry, Baby Achieves Satire and Self-Awareness
item.description: Personal filmmaking recalls Todd Solondz and redeems the A24 formula.

item.title: Celebrating the Historically Low Murder Rate
item.description: Not only did 2025 see the largest single-year reduction in homicide on record, but the level may now be as low as it has been since 1900.

item.title: Trump Is Letting Tim Walz Beat Him In Minneapolis
item.description: There is no deal to be made with officials who reject the law itself. And there is no obligation for Trump to meet them halfway.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Kill Scores Of Americans For Every Leftist Who Dies Protecting Them

item.title: Dems’ ‘Unconstitutional’ Bill Would Jail Law-Abiding Virginians For Guns They Already Own
item.description: Violators could face up to 12 months in prison and a restriction on ownership or possession of any and all firearms for three years.

item.title: SCOTUS Holds The Key To Stopping Virginia Democrats’ Gun Control Gambit. Will They Use It?
item.description: Two cases pending before SCOTUS give the justices the opportunity to stave off Virginia Democrats' seemingly unconstitutional gun control proposals.
